dregsmod:BananaPeel.NAME: Banana Peel
DESCRIPTIONS: When you are inflicted with #yWeak, inflict 1 #yWeak on all enemies.

dregsmod:CurseBrand.NAME: Curse Brand
dregsmod:CurseBrand.FLAVOR: This mark is reserved for the failed and fallen.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you draw a Curse, #yAwaken a random card.
Awoken attacks deal more Damage; awoken skills grant more Block or have more potent effects. NL A card can be Awakened more than once.

dregsmod:CursedLocket.NAME: Cursed Locket
dregsmod:CursedLocket.FLAVOR: Sealed with dark energy, it burns to the touch.

dregsmod:DeathBrand.NAME: Death Brand
dregsmod:DeathBrand.FLAVOR: This brand marks its bearer for execution.
DESCRIPTIONS: Replaces Curse Brand. Whenever you draw a Curse, #yAwaken a random card in your hand. Draw an additional card each turn.
Awoken attacks deal more Damage; awoken skills grant more Block or have more potent effects. NL A card can be Awakened more than once.

dregsmod:EvilEye.NAME: Evil Eye
DESCRIPTIONS: After each battle, heal 1 HP for each #yCurse remaining in your deck.

dregsmod:JadeSeal.NAME: Jade Seal
dregsmod:JadeSeal.FLAVOR: An ancient artifact from a forgotten empire.

dregsmod:LuckyClover.NAME: Lucky Clover
DESCRIPTIONS: At the beginning of each combat, gain 1 Plated Armor for each unique curse in your deck.

dregsmod:NeowsHatred.NAME: Neow's Hatred
dregsmod:NeowsHatred.FLAVOR: It feels like you were brought back just to fail.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you enter a Rest Site, add a Curse to your deck.

dregsmod:StickyBarb.NAME: Sticky Barb
DESCRIPTIONS: When you are inflicted with #yVulnerable, inflict 1 #yVulnerable on all enemies.
